topic.title: update failed
topic.body:
### Step 1: Please describe your environment

  * ZeroNet version: 0.6.2（3408）
  * Operating system: _windows 10 1803
  * Web browser: Firefox 59.0.3 x64
  * Tor status: disabled
  * Opened port: no
  * Special configuration: no

### Step 2: Describe the problem:

#### Steps to reproduce:

  1. blog always update failed
  2. storage limitation have been set 9999 mb

#### Observed Results:

  * What happened? This could be a screenshot, a description, log output (you can send log/debug.log file to hello@zeronet.io if necessary), etc.

#### Expected Results:

  * What did you expect to happen?
